text: Ruslan Mezentsev (also written Myezyentsev; born 24 June 1981) is a Ukrainian gymnast. He competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics and the 2004 Summer Olympics, winning a silver medal at the 2000 Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Ukraine Category:Gymnasts at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Kropyvnytskyi Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Ukraine
title: Ruslan Mezentsev
